actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Hearings held.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Hearings concluded. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 98-528.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding the measures the President should take to ensure the safety of United States Armed Forces in Lebanon.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the President should: (1) redefine the protective measures which the U.S. Armed Forces assigned to the Multinational Force in Lebanon may take to provide for their defense and security; (2) redeploy U.S. Armed Forces in Lebanon so as to minimize their vulnerability to terrorist attack; and (3) prepare and transmit to the Congress a report setting forth the measures that have been taken to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding the measures the President should take to ensure the safety of United States Armed Forces in Lebanon.
